trans-unit.source: Provides a base control designer class for extending the design-mode behavior of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 提供基控件设计器类，用于扩展 Web 服务器控件的设计模式行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class provides a base control designer class that can be inherited from and extended to provide design-time support for a Web server control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类提供基控件设计器类可以继承自和扩展设计主机中的 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The object model for working with design-time rendering is improved over earlier versions, with the following new base classes to provide access to the simplified object model:
trans-unit.target: 使用设计时呈现的对象模型得到改进了以下新基类以提供简化的对象模型的访问权的早期版本的基础上：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>, which is not new, but has been greatly improved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>它不是新的但得到了显著改善。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>。

trans-unit.source: Automatic Formatting
trans-unit.target: 自动格式设置

trans-unit.source: You can create a variety of automatic and pre-defined formats that can simplify the process of page developers who are applying complex style changes to custom Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建各种可以简化页面的开发人员要将复杂的样式更改应用到自定义 Web 服务器控件的过程的自动和预定义格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner> control, which derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class, provides many automatic formats from which to choose.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner>控件，它派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类中，提供了许多可供选择的自动格式。

trans-unit.source: To implement and provide automatic formatting in your custom controls, use the following features:
trans-unit.target: 实现并提供你自定义控件中的自动格式设置，请使用以下功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> 类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> 类。

trans-unit.source: Action Lists (Smart Tags)
trans-unit.target: 操作列出 （智能标记）

trans-unit.source: Action lists are menus of important or widely used tasks that a page developer who uses a control can perform in a design-time user interface (UI), such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 操作列表是菜单的重要或广泛使用的页开发人员使用控件在设计时用户界面 (UI)，可以执行的任务如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For example, the design-time view of your control could provide a menu of available tasks.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的控件的设计时视图可以提供可用的任务的菜单。

trans-unit.source: This includes a task to format the control automatically.
trans-unit.target: 这包括任务，以自动设置控件的格式。

trans-unit.source: To learn about action lists, start with the following features:
trans-unit.target: 若要了解有关操作列表，启动具有以下功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> 类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> 类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> 类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> 类。

trans-unit.source: Control Designer Regions
trans-unit.target: 控件设计器区域

trans-unit.source: Regions are editable areas in the design-time view of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 区域是 Web 服务器控件的设计时视图中可编辑区域。

trans-unit.source: This feature offers WYSIWYG-like editing of the template content, inner controls, and properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: 此功能提供类似所见即所得的设计时编辑的模板内容、 内部控件和属性。

trans-unit.source: You can have the control designer create controls in regions or you can use the Toolbox to drag and drop controls into regions.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在区域中创建控件的控件设计器或者你可以使用工具箱拖放到区域的控件。

trans-unit.source: Regions are managed with the following features:
trans-unit.target: 区域管理具有以下功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> 类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> 类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Templates
trans-unit.target: 模板

trans-unit.source: The model for creating a UI for design-time editing of templated controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, has been greatly improved from earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: 为设计时编辑的模板化控件，如创建 UI 的模型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中，已从早期版本的大大改进。

trans-unit.source: You can create complex custom controls that include templates for various parts of the control, and your custom control designer can help page developers who are modifying templates with the following features:
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建复杂的各个部分的控件，模板的自定义控件和自定义控件设计器中，可以帮助页开发人员正在修改模板具有以下功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> 类。

trans-unit.source: Design-Time Rendering
trans-unit.target: 设计时呈现

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class has the following methods to support design-time rendering of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类具有以下方法以支持的 Web 服务器控件的设计时呈现。

trans-unit.source: Most of these methods are the same as in earlier versions:
trans-unit.target: 这些方法的大部分都是与早期版本中的相同：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple designer class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个简单的设计器类，派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类。

trans-unit.source: This control designer supports a custom `TextControl` class and provides a command to change the text size of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 此控件设计器支持自定义`TextControl`类，并提供在设计时更改控件的文本大小的命令。

trans-unit.source: The control designer is associated with the control by specifying the control designer in a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> object declaration on the `TextControl` class.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定控件设计器中的与控件关联的控件设计器是<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>对象上声明`TextControl`类。

trans-unit.source: The key to persisting property changes from the control designer to the HTML markup is found in the `ToggleTextSize` method of the custom `ActionList` class.
trans-unit.target: 保留的属性更改到的 HTML 标记的控件设计器中的键位于`ToggleTextSize`方法的自定义`ActionList`类。

trans-unit.source: To try the example, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly and compile the code.
trans-unit.target: 若要试用示例，添加对 System.Design.dll 程序集的引用和代码编译。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the action list collection for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件设计器的操作列表集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> items for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> 对象，它包含控件设计器的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> 项。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, together with properties to set the Text properties on both internal controls, and also the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建简单复合控件与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件，以及属性，以在两个内部控件上设置的文本属性以及<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: An associated control designer class creates three <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> commands, each of which sets two properties on the control, and can be rolled back with the undo functionality of the design host.
trans-unit.target: 关联的控件设计器类创建三个<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>其中每个设置两个属性的控件上，并将其回滚设计主机的撤消功能的命令。

trans-unit.source: To add an action list menu to a custom control in design view, your custom control designer must override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ActionLists" /> property to return a custom control class that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加到设计视图中的自定义控件的操作列表菜单，自定义控件设计器中，必须重写<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ActionLists" />属性以返回自定义控件类派生自<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" />类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be resized in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以在设计时环境中调整控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the control can be resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的大小可以调整，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AllowResize%2A> property in a custom control designer class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AllowResize%2A>中自定义控件的设计器类的属性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AllowResize" /> property in derived classes to enable or disable page developers from resizing your control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: 使用<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AllowResize" />启用或禁用页调整您的控件设计宿主中的开发人员的派生类中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取将在设计时在关联控件的“自动套用格式”对话框中显示的预定义自动格式设置方案的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object that contains the predefined schemes for the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象，它包含控件预定义方案。

trans-unit.source: A complete Web server control includes not only the control, but also, possibly, a corresponding control designer class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class and a formatting class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: 一个完整的 Web 服务器控件包括不仅控件，但此外，如果可能，请相应的控件设计器类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类和派生自一个格式设置类<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property is a collection of instances of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>属性是集合的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>类。

trans-unit.source: For a working example of automatic formatting in [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 有关在中自动设置格式的工作示例[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property in a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>在自定义控件设计器中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The derived control designer implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property by adding three instances of a custom automatic format that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生的控件设计器实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>通过添加派生自的自定义自动格式的三个实例的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>类。

trans-unit.source: Controls that automatically expose AutoFormats get a task list and context commands for their formats.
trans-unit.target: 控件自动公开 Autoformat get 任务对其格式的列表和上下文命令。

trans-unit.source: When you are using automatic formats, use the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl" /> property to set the properties in your callback function.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用自动格式时，使用<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl" />属性在回调函数中设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates HTML markup to display an error message at design time.
trans-unit.target: 创建在设计时显示错误消息的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The error message to include in the generated HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 要包括在生成的 HTML 标记中的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Creates HTML markup to display a specified error message at design time.
trans-unit.target: 创建在设计时显示指定错误消息的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: An HTML markup string that contains the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含指定错误消息的 HTML 标记字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to create HTML markup to display an error message for a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法来创建要在设计时显示的错误消息的控件的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 值`errorMessage`指定在设计时显示给用户的控件的本地化的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns a table with two rows, as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法返回具有两个行的表，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The first row contains the type name and site name for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: 第一行包含的类型名称和站点名称<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>对象。

trans-unit.source: The second row contains the input error message string.
trans-unit.target: 第二行包含输入的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: To generate HTML markup for an error message with an associated exception, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%2CSystem.Exception%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要生成 HTML 标记为具有相关联的异常的错误消息，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%2CSystem.Exception%29>重载。

trans-unit.source: To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要生成异常的 HTML 标记，而无需指定本地化的错误消息，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String)" /> overload is functionally equivalent to calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String,System.Exception)" /> method with e set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String)" />重载在功能上等效于调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String,System.Exception)" />方法 e 设置为<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The error message to include in the generated HTML string.
trans-unit.target: 要包含在生成的 HTML 字符串中的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception to include in the generated HTML string.
trans-unit.target: 要包含在生成的 HTML 字符串中的异常。

trans-unit.source: Creates the HTML markup to display a specified exception error message at design time.
trans-unit.target: 创建在设计时显示指定异常错误消息的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: HTML markup that contains the specified <paramref name="errorMessage" /> and <paramref name="e" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定的 <paramref name="errorMessage" /> 和 <paramref name="e" /> 的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to provide simple HTML markup that can be used to display error and exception details for a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法以提供用于在设计时显示的控件的错误和异常详细信息的简单 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 值`errorMessage`指定在设计时显示给用户的控件的本地化的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns a table with two rows, as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法返回具有两个行的表，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The first row contains the type name and site name for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: 第一行包含的类型名称和站点名称<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>对象。

trans-unit.source: The second row contains the input error message and the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> string of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 第二行包含输入的错误消息和<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>异常的字符串。

trans-unit.source: To generate HTML markup for an error message without specifying an exception, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要在不指定异常的情况下生成一条错误消息的 HTML 标记，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29>重载。

trans-unit.source: To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要生成异常的 HTML 标记，而无需指定本地化的错误消息，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String,System.Exception)" /> method should be called from the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetViewRendering" /> or <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method when exceptions occur.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String,System.Exception)" />方法应从调用<see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetViewRendering" />或<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" />方法发生异常时。

trans-unit.source: Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个简单的矩形占位符表示形式，该表示形式显示该控件的类型和 ID。

trans-unit.source: The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 典型的设计模式是尝试通过关联的控件，获取 HTML 标记，如果遇到错误，然后调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: If no markup is returned by the control, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未返回标记由控件，调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" />方法，如果它未重写提供特定的标记，将调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" />方法，其中应包含信息的类型和控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个简单的矩形占位符表示形式，该表示形式显示该控件的类型和 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains design-time HTML markup providing basic information about the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含提供有关控件的基本信息的设计时 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 典型的设计模式是尝试通过关联的控件，获取 HTML 标记，如果遇到错误，然后调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: If no markup is returned by the control, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未返回标记由控件，调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" />方法，如果它未重写提供特定的标记，将调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" />方法，其中应包含信息的类型和控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains text and markup to add to the HTML output.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含要添加到 HTML 输出的文本和标记。

trans-unit.source: Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control, and also additional specified instructions or information.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个简单的矩形占位符表示形式，该表示形式显示该控件的类型和 ID 以及指定的附加说明或信息。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains design-time HTML markup providing information about the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含提供有关控件的信息的设计时 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a templated control designer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>在模板化控件设计器中的方法。

trans-unit.source: A string is then passed as the `instruction` parameter in a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A> method, which provides the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，然后作为传递`instruction`对的调用中的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A>提供的设计时 HTML 标记方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 典型的设计模式是尝试通过关联的控件，获取 HTML 标记，如果遇到错误，然后调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: If no markup is returned by the control, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未返回标记由控件，调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" />方法，如果它未重写提供特定的标记，将调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" />方法，其中应包含信息的类型和控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the associated control for viewing or rendering on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回要在设计图面上查看或呈现的关联控件的副本。

trans-unit.source: A Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether data binding is supported by the containing region for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示包含关联控件的区域是否支持数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the container for the control supports data binding; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的容器支持数据绑定，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that is used to persist data for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于在设计时保持关联控件数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState" /> property that implements <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> and uses the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService" /> to persist state data for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState" /> 属性，该属性实现 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> 并使用 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService" /> 在设计时保持关联控件的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: The values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> property are persisted even if the user switches from Design to Source view, or reloads the document, or closes and reopens the design host.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A>属性会保留，即使用户从设计切换到源视图，或重新加载文档，或关闭并重新打开设计宿主。

trans-unit.source: You can get and set values in the returned object as you would in an IDictionary object, with the values automatically persisted.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取和设置值中返回的对象，就像在 IDictionary 自动保存的对象，使用值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the view-control object for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件设计器的视图控件对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeElementView%2A> property is obsolete and there is no replacement for the functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeElementView%2A>属性已过时，并没有的功能替换。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the design host must finish loading before the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否必须在设计宿主完成加载之后才能调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if loading must be complete before the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须在完成加载之后才能调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> 方法，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A>属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> 属性已过时。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A>等效的控件设计器功能的方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the coordinates of the rectangle representing the boundaries for the control as displayed on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 检索矩形的坐标，该矩形表示设计图面上显示的控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> object representing the boundaries for the control on the design surface relative to the control, not the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 对象，表示设计图面上相对于控件而非文档的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 检索用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 检索用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>在自定义控件设计器中的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the Text property for the associated control is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 关联控件的文本属性是否为空，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method creates and renders a Hyperlink control.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法创建并将超链接控件呈现。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a custom container control, make sure that you render the control and all child controls at design time, regardless of whether the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible" /> property is set to <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建自定义容器控件，请确保，则该控件及其所有子控件在设计时呈现，而不管是否<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible" />属性设置为<see langword="true" />或<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of control designer regions for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 关联控件的控件设计器区域的集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup to display the control and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 检索用当前控件设计器区域显示控件并填充集合的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, including all control designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 关联控件的设计时 HTML 标记，包括所有控件设计器区域。

trans-unit.source: The design host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to get the design-time HTML markup and the current list of control designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 在设计主机调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法以获取的设计时 HTML 标记和当前列表控件的设计器区域。

trans-unit.source: Using the DesignerRegionCollection, the design host can then request the markup for each editable control designer region.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DesignerRegionCollection，设计宿主随后可请求为每个可编辑的控件设计器区域的标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is provided for a derived control designer, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class, that must process the content for the region before calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法提供为派生的控件设计器，如<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner>类，必须处理之前调用区域的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create HTML markup using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 HTML 标记中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> object that can retrieve global and local services.
trans-unit.target: 可检索全局和本地服务的 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns an appropriate resource provider factory, depending on the globalization settings in the configuration file for the site.
trans-unit.target: 根据站点配置文件中的全球化设置返回相应的资源提供程序工厂。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory" /> object, if any are defined in the configuration file; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在配置文件中定义了任何 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory" /> 对象，则为该对象；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A resource provider factory creates resource providers and resource writers, depending on the current settings in the system.web/globalization section of the configuration file (either the Machine.config or Web.config files for both global and local resources).
trans-unit.target: 资源提供程序工厂创建资源提供程序和资源编写器，具体取决于配置文件 （Machine.config 或 Web.config 文件的全局和本地资源的 system.web/globalization 部分中的当前设置).

trans-unit.source: If no globalization settings are found, the `serviceProvider` parameter is used to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory> object using the default implementation for the design host.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何全球化设置，`serviceProvider`参数用于创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory>对象设计主机使用的默认实现。

trans-unit.source: Typically, control developers will not override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeResourceProviderFactory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，控件开发人员将不会覆盖<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeResourceProviderFactory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object to get content for.
trans-unit.target: 要为其获取内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 返回关联控件设计时视图中可编辑区域的内容。

trans-unit.source: The persisted content for the region, if the control designer supports editable regions; otherwise, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果控件设计器支持可编辑区域，则为区域的保持内容；否则为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method returns an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法返回一个空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class can support region-based editing on the design surface and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method to return the content for a specified region.
trans-unit.target: 类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类可以支持基于区域的设计图面上编辑和重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法来返回指定的区域的内容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to get a reference to the design host, and then use the reference to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> object that creates the HTML markup for `region` and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取对设计宿主的引用，然后使用引用创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser>创建的 HTML 标记的对象`region`及其内容。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup to represent a Web server control at design time that will have no visual representation at run time.
trans-unit.target: 检索表示在设计时将不具有可视表示形式的运行时 Web 服务器控件的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup used to represent a control at design time that would otherwise have no visual representation.
trans-unit.target: 用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML 标记，若无该标记，则控件将没有可视表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The default is a rectangle that contains the type and ID of the component.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为包含组件类型和 ID 的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is to return a string that contains the name of the component.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法是返回一个字符串，包含组件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method should be called in the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method when there is no design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>应该调用方法的实现中<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法时没有设计时 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>在自定义控件设计器中的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the `Text` property for the associated control is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Text`关联控件的属性为空，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method creates and renders a `Hyperlink` control.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法将创建并呈现`Hyperlink`控件。

trans-unit.source: The exception that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生的异常。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup that provides information about the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 检索 HTML 标记，该标记提供有关指定异常的信息。

trans-unit.source: The design-time HTML markup for the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 指定的异常的设计时 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is typically called, if an exception is thrown in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>通常调用方法，如果中引发了异常<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to generate design-time HTML markup for the control when an error occurs and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何生成该控件发生错误时和调用的设计时 HTML 标记<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 典型的设计模式是尝试通过关联的控件，获取 HTML 标记，如果遇到错误，然后调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: If no markup is returned by the control, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未返回标记由控件，调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" />方法，如果它未重写提供特定的标记，将调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" />方法，其中应包含信息的类型和控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the persistable inner HTML markup of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时检索该控件的持久内部 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the persistable inner HTML markup for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示关联控件的持久性内部 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistenceContent" /> method to provide custom handling of the inner content persistence for the design host.
trans-unit.target: 重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistenceContent" />方法以提供自定义处理的设计宿主的内部内容持久性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the persistable inner HTML markup of the control.
trans-unit.target: 检索控件的持久性内部 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The persistable inner HTML markup of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的持久性内部 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistInnerHtml%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistInnerHtml%2A>方法已过时。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistenceContent%2A> method for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistenceContent%2A>等效的控件设计器功能的方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object that contains the design-time markup for the content and regions of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 检索一个对象，该对象包含关联控件的内容和区域的设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object that contains the design-time markup for the content and regions of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 检索一个对象，该对象包含关联控件的内容和区域的设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object that contains the design-time markup for the content and regions of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 检索一个对象，该对象包含指定控件的内容和区域的设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A control designer that derives from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 派生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> 的控件设计器。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object that contains the design-time markup for the content and regions of the associated control for the specified control designer.
trans-unit.target: 检索一个对象，该对象包含指定控件设计器关联控件的内容和区域的设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the properties of the associated control are hidden when the control is in template mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当控件处于模板模式时，关联控件的属性是否被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the properties of the associated control are hidden when the control is in template mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当控件处于模板模式时关联控件的属性被隐藏，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The ID property is never hidden.
trans-unit.target: 从不隐藏的 ID 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.HidePropertiesInTemplateMode%2A> property to determine whether properties, other than the ID property, should be hidden from the property grids while the control is in template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.HidePropertiesInTemplateMode%2A>属性来确定当控件处于编辑模式模板时，是否应在属性网格中隐藏之外的 ID 属性，属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID string for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的 ID 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The ID string for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的 ID 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A> property is used internally within the control designer and for interaction with the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A>属性内部使用，在控件设计器中和属性窗口与交互。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A> property shadows the run-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A>属性隐藏运行时<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The control being designed.
trans-unit.target: 正在设计的控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 初始化控件设计器并加载指定的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method is called by the design host to complete the following actions:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法由设计宿主中完成下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Load the control designer with the component to design.
trans-unit.target: 加载控件设计器与该组件，设计。

trans-unit.source: Set up the view on the control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置在控件使用视图<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Verify that the associated control is of the right type.
trans-unit.target: 验证关联的控件正确的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a control class and a control designer class that override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method to initialize internal variables.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件类和重写控件设计器类<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法以初始化内部变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is in either template viewing or editing mode in the design host.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件在设计宿主中是否处于模板查看模式或模板编辑模式之一。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode" /> property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode" /> 属性为只读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the control is in either template viewing or editing mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件处于模板查看模式或模板编辑模式之一，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A Web server control is in template mode when a read-only template is currently being viewed or an editable template is being edited in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Web 服务器控件是在模板模式下时当前正在查看的只读模板或一个可编辑的模板编辑，则在设计宿主中如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> object to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> value when the template mode changes for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类提供了一个默认<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>要更新对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>时的模板模式更改为关联控件的值。

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的自定义设计器<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>类可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>方法来执行其他处理时的模板编辑模式下更改设计宿主中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the control as displayed on the design surface and causes the design host to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 使设计图面上显示的控件无效，并使设计宿主调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method also calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法也会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the whole area of the control that is displayed on the design surface and signals the control designer to redraw the control.
trans-unit.target: 使显示在设计图面上的控件的整个区域无效，并向控件设计器发送重新绘制控件的信号。

trans-unit.source: To enable the control designer to handle paint events, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用控件设计器来处理绘制事件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A>中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A> method provides the design host with a way to instruct the control designer to redraw the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A>方法提供了一种方法，以指示控件设计器进行重绘控件设计宿主。

trans-unit.source: Essentially, this is the same as calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method, because it causes the whole control to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 从根本上讲，这是调用相同<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法，因为它会导致整个控件重绘。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> object that represents the area to invalidate, relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 对象，表示要使之无效的区域，它相对于控件的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified area of the control that is displayed on the design surface and signals the control designer to redraw the control.
trans-unit.target: 使显示在设计图面上的控件的指定区域无效，并向控件设计器发送重新绘制控件的信号。

trans-unit.source: To enable the control designer to handle paint events, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用控件设计器来处理绘制事件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A>中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A> method provides the design host with a way to instruct the control designer to redraw a specific part of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A>方法提供了一种方法，以指示控件设计器进行重绘控件的特定部分的设计宿主。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定参数将一系列更改包装到事务中，这些指定参数可以通过设计宿主的撤消功能作为一个单元进行回滚。

trans-unit.source: The control associated with the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 与控件设计器关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback" /> object representing a function to call in the control designer as part of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback" /> 对象，表示要在控件设计器中作为事务的一部分调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the argument for callback.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含回调参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 允许事务完成的效果的说明，由设计宿主用于使用户有机会取消事务。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定参数将一系列更改包装到事务中，这些指定参数可以通过设计宿主的撤消功能作为一个单元进行回滚。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method notifies the design host, which is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> property of `component`, that a change is occurring in the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context`, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>方法通知设计宿主，该域由<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>属性`component`，更改关联的控件中正在发生的并不会更改被取消设计宿主中，如果调用指定`callback`使用指定`context`，，然后通知设计宿主更改已完成。

trans-unit.source: If the design host or the associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException> exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`.
trans-unit.target: 如果设计宿主或关联的控件引发静态`Canceled`异常字段<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException>异常，事务被取消而无需调用`callback`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, together with properties to set the label text, and also the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建简单复合控件与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件和属性以设置的标签文本，以及<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: An associated control designer class creates three <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> commands, each of which sets two properties on the control.
trans-unit.target: 关联的控件设计器类创建三个<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>命令，其中每个设置控件的两个属性。

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, you can use the undo functionality of the design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], to roll back each completed transaction as a unit.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>方法，如上，你可以使用设计宿主的撤消功能[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]、 回滚作为一个单元的每个已完成的事务。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The control associated with the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 与控件设计器关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback" /> object representing a function to call in the control designer as part of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback" /> 对象，表示要在控件设计器中作为事务的一部分调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the argument for callback.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含回调参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 允许事务完成的效果的说明，由设计宿主用于使用户有机会取消事务。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor" /> object (typically, either an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> or a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> object) that describes the member of the associated control that is being invoked as part of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor" /> 对象（通常是 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 对象），它描述作为事务的一部分进行调用的关联控件的成员。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定参数将一系列更改包装到事务中，这些指定参数可以通过设计宿主的撤消功能作为一个单元进行回滚。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method notifies the design host, which is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> property of `component`, that a change is occurring to the specified `member` (property or method) of the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context` as the argument, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>方法通知设计宿主，该域由<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>属性`component`，更改发生到指定`member`（属性或方法） 的关联控件，并且在更改不会被取消设计宿主，调用指定`callback`使用指定`context`作为自变量，然后通知设计宿主更改已完成。

trans-unit.source: If the design host or associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException> exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`.
trans-unit.target: 如果设计宿主或关联的控件引发静态`Canceled`异常字段<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException>异常，事务被取消而无需调用`callback`。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> object representing the design host that provides control designer services for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> 对象，它表示为关联控件提供控件设计器服务的设计宿主。

trans-unit.source: The control associated with the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 与控件设计器关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback" /> object representing a function to call in the control designer as part of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback" /> 对象，表示要在控件设计器中作为事务的一部分调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the argument for callback.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含回调参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 允许事务完成的效果的说明，由设计宿主用于使用户有机会取消事务。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor" /> object (typically either an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> or a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> object) that describes the member of the associated control that is being invoked as part of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor" /> 对象（通常是 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 对象），描述作为事务的一部分进行调用的关联控件的成员。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定参数将一系列更改包装到事务中，这些指定参数可以通过设计宿主的撤消功能作为一个单元进行回滚。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method notifies the design host, which is represented by `serviceProvider`, that a change is occurring to the specified `member` (property or method) of the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context` as the argument, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>方法通知设计宿主，由表示`serviceProvider`，更改发生到指定`member`（属性或方法） 的关联控件并且，如果不取消更改设计主机，调用指定`callback`使用指定`context`作为自变量，然后通知设计宿主更改已完成。

trans-unit.source: If the design host or the associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException> exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`.
trans-unit.target: 如果设计宿主或关联的控件引发静态`Canceled`异常字段<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException>异常，事务被取消而无需调用`callback`。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceProvider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceProvider" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Web server control has been marked as changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Web 服务器控件是否已被标记为已更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the Web server control has changed since it was last persisted or loaded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 服务器控件自上次保持或加载后已更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.IsDirty%2A> property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.IsDirty%2A> 属性已过时。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetDirty%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetDirty%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A>等效的控件设计器功能的属性。

trans-unit.source: The property to test for data binding.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试数据绑定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating whether the specified property on the associated control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 检索一个值，该值指示关联控件上的指定属性是否是数据绑定的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the property is data-bound; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性是数据绑定的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.IsPropertyBound%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.IsPropertyBound%2A>方法已过时。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Contains%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A> property for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Contains%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A>等效的控件设计器功能的属性。

trans-unit.source: An object derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDesignTimeResourceWriter" /> object that is used to write resources into the design-time response stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个派生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDesignTimeResourceWriter" /> 对象的对象，用于将资源写入设计时响应流中。

trans-unit.source: Uses the provided resource writer to persist the localizable properties of the associated control to a resource in the design host.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的资源编写器将关联控件的可本地化属性保持到设计宿主中的某个资源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Localize%2A> method is called by the design host to create resource entries for each property that is marked with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> object and any properties that use an explicit resource expression as a value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Localize%2A>设计宿主才能创建标记为每个属性的资源项调用方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>对象并使用显式资源表达式作为一个值的任何属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object that defines a style.
trans-unit.target: 定义样式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Called when a predefined, automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 对关联控件应用预定义的自动格式设置方案后调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called after a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object has applied a predefined format to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>方法后，会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>对象已应用于关联控件的预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines the automatic formatting scheme name and style settings that are applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>对象定义应用于控件的自动格式设置方案名称和样式设置。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method to perform additional processing when an automatic formatting scheme is applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类替代<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>方法来执行其他处理，当自动格式设置方案应用于关联控件。

trans-unit.source: The property to test for changes in its bindings collection.
trans-unit.target: 要测试其绑定集合中的更改的属性。

trans-unit.source: Called when the data-binding collection changes.
trans-unit.target: 在数据绑定集合发生更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> method is called when the data-binding collection has been changed by an external caller.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A>时数据绑定集合已由外部调用方调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A>方法已过时。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Changed> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A> collection for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Changed>上的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A>等效的控件设计器功能的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs" /> object that specifies the location and, possibly, the control designer region that the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs" /> 对象，它指定了位置，还可能指定了用户单击的控件设计器区域。

trans-unit.source: Called by the design host when the user clicks the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在设计时单击关联控件时由设计宿主调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the design host for certain actions on a control in the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>事件由设计宿主中为设计图面中的控件上的某些操作引发。

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised for the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下情况下引发一个事件：

trans-unit.source: The user clicks the control.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击控件。

trans-unit.source: The control designer paints on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在设计图面上的控件设计器绘制。

trans-unit.source: The user enters or exits template editing mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: 用户进入或退出模板编辑模式的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类提供了一个默认委托来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to process events that are raised when the user clicks a control.
trans-unit.target: 类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>以处理在用户单击控件时引发的事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>方法允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method returns without performing any processing.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>方法返回而不执行任何处理。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> event in a clickable region of the control and use a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object to identify the region that is being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>可单击的控件和使用的区域中的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>用于标识所单击的区域的对象。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例的一个更大的代码示例摘自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>类。

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)" /> method in a class deriving from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> class to handle design-time click events on the control.
trans-unit.target: 重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)" />派生自的类方法<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />类来处理设计时单击该控件上的事件。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="e" /> is not null, the clicked region, if any, is specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="e" />是不为 null，被单击的区域中，在指定的任何，<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region" />属性。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Called when the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: 在关联控件发生更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when a property on the associated control is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>关联控件的属性发生更改时调用方法。

trans-unit.source: It allows the implementer to do any processing that might be required after a property change.
trans-unit.target: 它允许实施者执行属性更改后可能需要的任何处理。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method causes the design host to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>方法会使设计宿主调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method also persists the control in the page markup.
trans-unit.target: 基实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>方法也会保留的页标记中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> method to provide additional processing before persisting the control and before refreshing the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" />方法以提供额外的处理之前保持该控件和刷新的设计时 HTML 标记之前。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, make sure that you call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，请确保你调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" />方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件源的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging" /> event for the associated control.
